mention.text: damage to undersea cables connecting europe , africa and asia
the lines , which run hit the egyptian coast at alexandria and go on to connect to asia
the lines , which take years of planning to install
a director at telecoms company interoute
the potential impact of an outage of this size
to alan mauldin , research director of communications
the succession of problems in the region
